About.Desc: Hi! I'm a software developer currently operating from Sweden. I have made this page to combine an introduction of me as a person with a summary of my skillset and to present some of my previous work. Find out more below.

Infospread.Title: Infospread Euro AB
Desc: I worked together with Infospread during the time of my engineering studies and this partnership led to several developed software products.
I had the role of reasearcher and developer and my main accomplishments were:
Roles: A front end mobile testing software using the 'Appium'-Framework
Accessibility adaptions using voice navigation (google assistant)
Regular bugfixing using issue tracking systems
A report and a prototype of data analytics using progressive machine learning.

JU.Title: Jönköping University
JU.Desc: After studying about 3 years I graduated from Jönköping University 2020, I wrote my thesis work in collaboration with Infospread and it's researching the predictability in commuting data patterns. My grades and this research work can be found below.

Skills.Desc: I have been coding in different languages depending on the requirements of the task. I would say the languages and frameworks I feel most confortable with are: Java (Android Studio), Javascript (Node.js & React), Python 3.5, Obj-C or Swift (X-Code)

Portfolio.Desc: When I'm not in the kitchen cooking food to music, I sometimes spend my spare time coding. Some of the results of this activity can be found below. The source code to some projects needs to be requested.
